dimensions: Warp x Weft: 325.1 x 51 cm (10 ft. 8 in. x 20 1/16 in.)
title: Kibiso Stripes
medium:
Medium: 100% silk (raw silk and kibiso)
Technique: plain weave with paired warps
description: Panel of horizontal stripes in black and white. Pairs of white stripes are made from thick white silk (kibiso) weft that alternate with single black stripes of black warp and weft. Black silk threads are lightly twisted.
name: Textile
